message:
SYSTEM: 05_OWL.pdf: Página 73
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
53
OWL 2
Class Hierarchy (II)
The Meaning of Subclass: all individuals that are members of the
class TomatoTopping are members of the class VegetableTopping
and members of the class PizzaTopping as we have stated that
TomatoTopping is a subclass of VegetableTopping which is a
subclass of PizzaTopping.
In OWL subclass means necessary implication. In other words, if VegetableTopping is a
subclass of PizzaTopping then ALL instances of VegetableTopping are instances of
PizzaTopping, without exception — if something is a VegetableTopping then this implies
that it is also a PizzaTopping.
speaker: SYSTEM
